title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.4 - Written application required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.4 - Written application required

State Regulations

The requests for information shall be on a completed written
application, Appendix 25-A, infra. It shall be necessary for the applicant to
specify the record requested and of what record the applicant desires a
copy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1500.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
